MEDEVAC/CASEVAC Plan
Medical Plan: -In the event of a medical emergency, the serial commander will call a security halt and have an RTO prepare and call up a 9-line to the Firing Desk.
-Treatment will immediately be conducted by the nearest able CLS qualified soldier until the serial medic arrives and takes over.
-The vehicle in the convoy closest to the nearest AXP/HLZ that is coordinated with the firing desk will transport the casualty.
-Once the convoy has exited GTA the nearest treatment facility will likely be Klinikum St. Marien in Amberg.
-Once the MED vehicle has departed and is enroute, the serial commander will resume movement of the convoy.
Send up 5Ws through CPT Rohleder +1 414-306-2442
